analysis.key_quote: Adoption of this Proposed Rule will have dire consequences on our country's ability to conduct the best research, educate the best trainees, build the best infrastructure, and provide the best services.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan civil servants in grantmaking and the potential negative impact on scientific integrity and merit-based evaluations. It expresses concerns about politicization and the loss of due process protections for career civil servants.
